title: search document
description: Search for documents connected to a legal id
include_confidential: Include confidential documents in the search

errors.invalidLegalId: You have entered an illegal legal id or organization number (legal id has format of YYYYMMDDNNNN or YYYYMMDD-NNNN and organization numbers has format of NNNNNNNNNN or NNNNNN-NNNN)
errors.legalIdNotTranslatable: The entered legal id or organization number can not be translated
errors.errorSearchingDocuments: An error occurred when searching for matching documents
